MABONDELI OYO EUTI NA MOTEMA
Ntango moto abondelaka, asopaka motema na ye liboso ya Nzambe, na maloba mosusu ayebisaka Nzambe nyonso oyo ezali na kati ya motema na ye. (Nzembo 62:8) Nzambe Mozwi-ya-Nguya-Nyonso alingaka mabondeli oyo eutaka na motema.
BƐNGÁ NZAMBE NA NKOMBO
Nzambe azali na batitre mingi, kasi azali na nkombo moko. Makomami Mosantu elobi: “Ngai Yehova. Yango nde nkombo na ngai.” (Yisaya 42:8) Nkombo Yehova ezali mbala soki 7 000 na Makomami Mosantu. Basakoli mingi bazalaki kobenga Nzambe na nkombo na ye ntango bazalaki kobondela. Abrahama alobaki ete: “Yehova . . . nabondeli yo, . . . tiká ngai naloba lisusu [na yo].” (Ebandeli 18:30) Biso mpe ntango tozali kobondela Nzambe, tosengeli kobenga ye na nkombo na ye: Yehova.
BONDELÁ NA MONƆKƆ OYO OYEBI MALAMU
Ata soki tobondeli Nzambe na monɔkɔ nini, ayebi makanisi na biso mpe makambo oyo tozali na yango na motema. Makomami Mosantu elobi ete: “Nzambe aponaka bilongi te, kasi na ekólo nyonso moto oyo azali kobanga ye mpe azali kosala makambo ya boyengebene andimami na ye.”—Misala 10:34, 35.
Kasi mpo Nzambe apambola biso tosengeli kosuka kaka te na kobondela. Masolo oyo elandi ekolobela makambo mosusu oyo tosengeli kosala.
